thanks.title: To be continued...
thanks.description:
Thanks for visiting my portfolio. 
I hope you like it!

globant.title: Game Developer
globant.description: I'm part of a 'AAA' game dev team since January. I can't give much information about this game because of the NDA, but I'm sure you played it.

ratherlabs.title: Lead Game Dev
ratherlabs.description: Developed an NFT WebGL fighting game, including core gameplay mechanics, AI, characters creator engine, and multiplayer features.

agonalea.title: Lead Game Dev
agonalea.description: Led a team of devs in the development of Rhythm Realms an Android & iOS game. Developed core gameplay mechanics, aswell I implemented some critical features like inventory, lootboxes, exp system and cloud saving system. Rhythm Reals is one of the selected games by Google Play Games Fund program.

cloodie.title: Full-stack Web Developer
cloodie.description: Developed microservices with Node.Js, and front-end modules with Vue.Js for a telemedicine web app.

delivergames.title: Indie game dev
delivergames.description:
My first experience as a game dev.
In this company, I Developed mobile games for small clients with Unity and Godot, some games has been published in Google Playstore and itch.io
